title: Torque Vue
description: [Torque Vue](https://github.com/mguyco/torque) is a modern web dashboard that analyzes your vehicles real-time OBD2 data to calculate trends and record trips that can be viewed anywhere on any device. Get service reminder notifications and view your vehicles health report card. Track your fleet or whatever is in your driveway - quickly toggle between vehicles and compare data between your rides. This app uses data provided by [Torque Pro](https://torque-bhp.com).
